body.p: In answer to your circular I send you the following—
My works as they now stand (in the latest edition published by me at Camden N JNew Jersey about a year ago, June 1876) consist of Two Volumes
LEAVES OF GRASS, copyrighted 1876, 384 pages 12 mo, (with portraits)
—The first edition 72 pages, small quarto, was pubpublished in Brooklyn N YNew York in 1855
—Second New York City 1857—third 1860 (by Thayer & Eldridge Boston)
—fourth New York City 1865—fifth Washington D C 1871—Sixth & last as above.
(—all the editions except the third by me)
TWO RIVULETS, copyrighted 1876, 350 pages 12 mo. with photo.—including Democratic Vistas, Memoranda of the War, and Passage to India

I publish & sell these Vols.Volumes at $5 a piece. Each VolVolume contains autograph & portrait—I enclose proofs of the title pages of the above two Vols.Volumes Also a circular or advadvertisement. If needed will cheerfully furnish you any further information on the matter—Address me here—
